body_content.explanation: used instead of a particular name to refer to someone or something, especially when the real name is not important or you have forgotten it:
examples: She always keeps me up to date with the latest gossip - you know, so-and-so from down the road is having a baby and so-and-so's just bought a car.

body_content.explanation: a polite way of referring to an unpleasant person:
examples: Mr Baker was such a so-and-so - he was always really mean!
